text: María Esther Gorostiza Rodríguez (28 October 1931 – 18 May 2019), better known as Analía Gadé, was an Argentine actress. She appeared in more than 60 movies between 1948 and 2001. She starred in movies such as Emergency Ward (1952), Yesterday Was Spring (1955), Crime on a Summer Morning (1965), Another's Wife (1967) and The King is the Best Mayor (1974). She was born in Córdoba. Her brother was playwright Carlos Gorostiza. Gadé died on 18 May 2019 of cancer in Madrid. She was 87. ==Selected filmography== * Emergency Ward (1952) * La vida por delante (1958) * La vida alrededor (1959) * For Men Only (1960) * The Crossroads (1960) * You and Me Are Three (1962) * Las cuatro noches de la luna llena (1963) * Crime on a Summer Morning (1965) * Another's Wife (1967) * Nothing Less Than a Real Man (1972) * The Doubt (1972) * The Marriage Revolution (1974) * The King is the Best Mayor (1974) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Córdoba, Argentina Category:Argentine stage actors
title: Analía Gadé
